name: Spiced Baked Fish Recipe | Tahir Chaudhary | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Spiced Baked Fish Recipe: Fish Fillet 500gm Oil 2 tbsp Salt 1 tsp Crushed Black Pepper 1/4 tsp Tomatoes Chopped 3 Chopped Onion 1 Lemon Juice 2 tbsp Oregano 1tsp Thyme 1 tsp Chopped Garlic 1tsp Chopped Chili 1tsp
instructions: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F. Sprinkle all ingredients on top of the the fish with oil, salt,chili, garlic, pepper, tomatoes, onion, lemon juice, oregano, thyme. Place a fish fillet on top of foil sheet. Wrap the ends of the foil to form a spiral shape. Fold the sides of the foil over the fish and tomato mixture, covering completely; seal the packets closed. Place the foil packet on a heavy large baking sheet. Bake until the fish is just cooked through, about 15 minutes and transfer the foil packets to plates and serve.
